module, class, library, set theory, product, relationship, structure, process plant
This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module to record:
classes of product, and composition, connection and containment relationships between them;
classes of composition, connection and containment relationship betweeen products;
a hierarchy of specialisation relationships between classes of product and classes of relationship between products.
class of product, and the structure of a class of product which is defined by composition, connection and containment relationships;
set theory relationships between classes of product and relationships.
cardinalities of relationships.
the structure of an individual product; The structure of an individual product is within the scope of the Individual_product_structure application module.
the involvement of classes of product, classes of documents, classes of people and classes of organisation in a class of activity. The involvement of classes of product, classes of documents, classes of people and classes of organisation in a class of activity is within the scope of the Class_of_involvement_in_activity application module.
